name: Les Jardins de Skoura

reviews.text: Wonderful place. make it here for a couple of nights if you are in Marrakesh. So interesting to see an oasis in the middle of the desert. the staff were wonderful and the food amazing. it's so reasonably priced, as well. Ask for the larger rooms with the fire places and en suite bathrooms.
reviews.title: Wonderful place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic setting, wonderful rooms, wonderful staff.
reviews.title: Awesome
Fantastic Moroccan B+B
reviews.text: Les Jardins de Skoura is a fabulous small hotel (approx. 7 rooms) off the beaten path in Skoura oasis. A charming building with terraces and traditional rooms, Les Jardins de Skoura demonstrates rigourous attention to detail.

aka: Les Jardins De Skoura Hotel Skoura
